sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.9%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble registers a 5.0% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Cisco Systems ( CSCO ), trading down 0.8%.
Cisco Systems is showing a gain of 3.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are UnitedHealth Group ( UNH ), trading down 0.5%, and Visa ( V ), trading up 0.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
